calendar system for long expanses of time, written #.#.#.#.# (i.e. 9.0.0.0.0), composed of bak'tuns (400 years), k'atuns (20 years), tuns (360 day years), winals (20 days), and k'ins (days). Often followed by Tzolk'in, Haab, and/or Lord of the Night
